remarks: The inverse matrix transformation applied to the zero polynomial matrix results in the zero of the matrices over the base ring of the polynomials.  (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
m2cpminv0.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
m2cpminv0.i $e |- I = ( N cPolyMatToMat R ) $.
m2cpminv0.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
m2cpminv0.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
m2cpminv0.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` A ) $.
m2cpminv0.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` C ) $.
m2cpminv0 $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( I ` Z ) = .0. ) $.
